p: Similarly, 3a and 3b reacted with ethyl cyanoacetate ( 4b) in the same above reaction conditions to afford 6-oxopyrazolo[4,3- c]pyridazine derivatives 6b and 6d based on the elemental analysis and spectral data. The IR spectra of 6b and 6d indicate the presence of C≡N absorption bands at 2207, 2217 cm −1, respectively and C=O at 1728, 1732 cm −1, respectively. 1H NMR spectra of 6b and 6d showed the presence of only one signal attributed to NH at 9.60 and 9.42 ppm, respectively. Also, its 13C NMR spectra revealed the signals of amidic C=O at 169.7 and 168.7 ppm, respectively.
